title: New: Plastic Flowers – Summertime Pop
body:
Greek indie pop duo [**Plastic Flowers**](https://www.

facebook.com/PlasticFlowers) just released their rather fantastic new single **Summertime Pop** ahead of their debut full length release which will drop on March 3. Its old fashioned, guitar driven, c-86 inspired sugary pop smells like flowers in the spring time while it carries a fragile sign of classic in the most innocent, unpretentious manner. Stream it below and stay tuned for [**Evergreen LP**](http://www.inner-ear.gr/gr/releases/artist/70-plastic-flowers/108-evergreen/) set to drop via **Crash Symbols** and [**Inner Ear**](http://www.inner-ear.gr/gr/releases/artist/70-plastic-flowers/108-evergreen/) which also includes contributions from **Keep Shelly In Athens** and **Ed Askew**. \[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/137007280″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
